at.pwd.boardgame.services

Class ConfigService

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.pwd.boardgame.services.ConfigService

  • public class ConfigService
extends java.lang.Object
    Persists and loads the configuration of the mancala game.

      • addAgent

                     java.lang.String className)
        adds a new agent to the configuration. If the same agent already exists it is not added.
        Parameters:

        className - The class name of the given agent
